rules: Rule1: Provided that the manufacturer uses the device, the manufacturer synthesizes the substance.
Rule2: Either the manufacturer uses the device or the manufacturer develops the substance.
Rule3: In the event that the manufacturer develops the substance, the substance is safe.
Rule4: Should the manufacturer test the substance, the substance is safe.
Rule5: Either the regulator approves the substance or it is not the case that the manufacturer recalls the substance.
Rule6: If it is not the case that using the device implies the substance is safe, then the manufacturer halts production.
Rule7: Given that it is not the case that using the device implies the substance is safe, the manufacturer does not halt production.
Rule8: Whenever it is not the case that synthesizing the substance implies testing it, the manufacturer recalls the substance.
facts: Fact1: It is not the case that the regulator approves the substance.
